General.Name: Puma Exploration Inc
General.Description: Puma Exploration Inc., a junior mining exploration company, acquires, explores for, and develops mining properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. Its flagship project is the Williams Brook Gold project covering an area of approximately 30,000 hectares located in New Brunswick. It also holds 100% interest in Jonpol and Portage properties. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Rimouski, Canada.
General.Address: 175, Legaré Street, Rimouski, QC, Canada, G5L 3B9
